com.bumptech.glide.loader.bitmap.transformation
Interface TransformationLoader<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the model to be loaded
All Known Implementing Classes:
CenterCrop, FitCenter, MultiTransformationLoader, None
public interface TransformationLoader<T>

A class for loading a Transformation for a particular model. This allows things like rotating the image based on its exif data

Method Summary

          Get a unique identifier for this TransformationLoader.
